def_cn: 取出(人或动物)的内脏;将…开膛破肚
def_en: To disembowel a person or animal means to remove their internal organs, especially their stomach, intestines, and bowels.

def_cn: 取出…内部的东西;把…掏空
def_en: To disembowel something means to take out the inside of it, especially in a such a way that it is destroyed or made completely useless.
